about_the_game:
Royal Wars: Farm TD

About This Game

Royal Wars: Farm TD offers a fresh twist on tower defense with a unique blend of strategy, luck, and resource management. Jump into the action and defend your kingdom against relentless waves of enemies using an innovative system that challenges you to think on your feet!

Key Features:

  • Random Tower Selection: Place your towers strategically, but expect the unexpected! Each tower is randomly selected from a pool, forcing you to adapt your tactics with every placement.

  • Tiered Tower System: Merge identical towers to unlock higher-tier versions! Combine two Tier 1 towers to get a random Tier 2 tower. Continue merging up to Tier 5, each bringing new powers and abilities to your defense.

  • Wave-Based Combat: Survive increasingly challenging waves of enemies. With each wave you overcome, earn gold to bolster your defenses and prepare for the next onslaught.

  • Resource Management: Earn gold by defeating enemies and surviving waves. Use your gold wisely to plant crystals or place towers.

  • Crystal Harvesting: Plant red, blue, and green crystals that grow over two rounds. Harvest them at the end of their cycle, yielding a random number of crystals. The market value of crystals fluctuates each round, so sell at the right time to maximize your earnings!

  • Dynamic Economy: The value of your harvested crystals varies from round to round. Play the market carefully to maximize your kingdom's wealth.

Free-to-Play Experience:

  • 10 Free Levels: Enjoy the full core experience of Royal Wars: Farm TD with 10 exciting levels available at no cost. Test your strategy, refine your tactics, and see how far you can get in defending your kingdom.

  • Support DLC Coming Soon: Expand your adventure with additional levels and challenges! The upcoming support DLC will introduce more levels, new enemies, and extra content for players looking to deepen their Royal Wars: Farm TD experience.

Why Early Access?

We’re launching Royal Wars: Farm TD in Early Access to gather valuable feedback from the community. Your insights will help us refine gameplay, enhance features, and ensure that the full release delivers the best possible experience. We’re excited to develop the game alongside our players, shaping its future together.

Planned Features for Full Release:

  • Expanded Tower and Enemy Variety: More towers, more enemies, and more strategic options.

  • Additional Levels via DLC: More levels and content will be available through DLC to support the game’s development.

  • Leaderboards and Achievements: Climb the leaderboards and unlock achievements to showcase your strategy skills.

  • Polish and Balance Tweaks: Refine every aspect of gameplay to ensure a challenging and fair experience.

How Long Will The Game Be In Early Access?

We plan to be in Early Access for approximately 12 months, depending on the feedback and additional content we plan to develop.

short_description: Royal Wars: Farm TD is a free-to-play tower defense game where strategy meets luck. Place randomly selected towers, merge them to unlock higher tiers, and defend your kingdom through multiple levels. Plant crystals, manage resources, and prepare for epic battles.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Portugal, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
